snippet.title: A Duel Hand Disaster: Trackher - Arcade is NOT Dead
snippet.description:
Housemarque quickly found a place in my heart with Super Stardust HD, then with Resogun. With Nex Machina though, something felt off, it felt somewhat "empty." Once I read their blog post titled "Arcade Is Dead" I immediately knew why...

http://www.housemarque.com/arcade-is-dead/
